How We Work

Our experties lies in providing robust robust service & system design, implementations, integrations and operation maintanance support to telecom service providers thus adding value to their service by optimizing cost structure and enhancing reach.

With established foot prints across the globe, Nectar Infotel has already started implementing Automation in its services resulting in cost efficient and improved delivery to the customers

Salakiaku Bruno
Head of IT Infrastructure – Unitel

 I would like to express our gratitude that during last year 2019 and since at the beginning, Nectar Infotel team are delivering and attending Movicel technical expectations.

All thanks to Nectar Infotel to enable us to grow our brand and reputation in the market by providing various Telecom OSS/BSS and Software Development. We are delighted to have witnessed the high-level competence and commitment exhibited by the Nectar’s team.

António ZUMBUCA Francisco
Director Executivo Tecnico/CTO – Movicel Telecomunicações, SA

Things that standout about Nectar Infotel is its integrity, commitment and foresightedness. Their support for our Software solutions & IT Infra have helped us to save overheads costs and gain business insights to launch various new Initiatives & achieve desired revenue growth!

Ayman Salame
Chief Information Officer – Smile Communications Nigeria Ltd
